sobject_id.description: The sobject id that was used to construct the element.

prototype_plan_hash.description: The hash of the plan for the prototype of the element.

pose.description: The pose of the element instance.  TODO: Think of a formalization for modifiers. repeated Modifier modifiers = 3;

Element.title: Element
Element.description: An element is the atom of a design. It has several representations and a pose.

w.description: The value of the real part of the quaternion.

x.description: The first value of the imaginary part of the quaternion.

y.description: The second value of the imaginary part of the quaternion.

z.description: The third value of the imaginary part of the quaternion.

semio.geometry.v1.Quaternion.title: Quaternion
semio.geometry.v1.Quaternion.description: (Unit) quaternions represent (here) (rotational) orientation. It can be interpreted as the view of an object.

point_of_view.description: Point of view (origin) from the pose (reference frame/coordinate system)

view.description: View (orientation) from the pose (reference frame/coordinate system)

semio.model.v1.Pose.title: Pose
semio.model.v1.Pose.description: A pose is a static reference frame/coordinate system.
